comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Howard W. Gill  Aero Club of America Pilot # 31  July 12, 1911 Nassau Boulevard Aerodrome
The aircraft depicted , Wright Model B, arrived in Miami, July 16, 1911
First flights / first passenger flight in Miami , Florida history
July 20,1911  (3) flights by Gill First flight  in Miami history  4 pm  5,000 spectators
July 21.1911  (4) flights by Gill  
The third flight of July 21,1911 was a climb to 7,500 feet.
The fourth flight of July 21,1911 was a passenger flight , John ( E. G.) Sewell  one of Miami's leading citizens . First  passenger flight  in Miami history
